Description of incident: "On April 22, 2016, my office was subject to a spam email which we believe went to many patients. Though no patient information was affected by that correspondence, we sent a notification email to al individuals on our email list, informing them of the spam. Inadvertently, the recipient list for the notificaation email on April 22, 2016 was not hidden."The information compromised included first and last names, email addresses.More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-61958
